name: tm07
effect: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Zap Cannon Gen I: Horn Drill)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Summons a hailstorm
that hurts all
types except ICE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Creates a hailstorm
that damages all
types except ICE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A hailstorm lasting
five turns damages
all POKéMON except
the ICE-type.

five turns. The hailstorm damages
all types except Ice.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Enables the user to protect itself from all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid
succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
